entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
